name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to online news, on December 12, an independent film screening event was held in Xi'an, and the content was a gay documentary "Greek Queer Revolution".
Just after the screening started for more than ten minutes, the police and the Cultural Bureau jointly enforced the law and stopped the screening.
There were nearly 40 people in the audience, and they stayed on the spot for an hour. At first, they were not allowed to leave, saying that everyone's ID card had to be registered. They encountered strong opposition from everyone, and finally let the audience go. The organizer was also investigated by the police and the Cultural Bureau on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, the organizers returned all tickets and disbanded the group.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In front of Xinxing Police Station, Yanliang District, Xi'an City, Shaanxi Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that emergency drills for vaccine safety emergencies have been conducted in many places recently.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Close windows wherever you go"
Communities in Nanning, Guangxi received a notice that they need to close windows in the next few days.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 13, in Tonghua County, Tonghua City, Jilin Province, the owners of Huachen Real Estate defended their rights.
It is reported that the owners purchased the shops on the basement floor of the Gemdale Building from Huachen Real Estate in 2014. At the time of purchase, the developer promised that the shops could be opened 24 months after the full payment. Later, the project was left unfinished. The owners have been defending their rights for ten years but to no avail. Some families have even invested all their savings.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 12, Xingtai City, Hebei Province. Owners of Fengzhou Xuefu Community defend their rights
It is reported that the owners accused Fengzhou Xuefu of false propaganda, and the supporting facilities after delivery are comparable to those of the old community 20 years ago, which caused dissatisfaction among the owners.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 11, in Shandong, some netizens took photos of a flag-raising ceremony being held in a Huawei store.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to news on December 12, as of December 11, in 2023, China has had 10,900 chip-related companies deregistered or revoked their industrial and commercial registrations, an increase of 69.8% year-on-year and 89.7% from 5,746 in 2022; 65,700 new chip-related companies were registered during the same period, an increase of 9.5% year-on-year. The number of 10,900 chip-related companies deregistered and revoked in 2023 far exceeds that of previous years. This means that on average, more than 31 chip companies deregister or revoke their industrial and commercial information every day. According to the editor's analysis, in the past five years, the number of chip-related companies that have been revoked and cancelled in China has exceeded 22,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Two community canteens in Shenyang were closed less than two months after they opened. Netizens questioned whether they were trying to obtain government subsidies.
December 11, Shenyang. Some netizens said that the Wanshan and Taoshan stores of Shenyang Ruilanxiang Community Canteen issued notices announcing the closure of business for rectification and the deactivation of membership cards. However, these two community canteens have been open for less than two months and have been reported by many media.
Netizens questioned whether the companies owned by the two community canteens were taking government subsidies.  
On December 12, the person in charge of Shenyang Ruilanxiang Catering Management Co., Ltd. responded that there was no cheating of government subsidies as mentioned online. The two community canteens only enjoyed the government’s rent discounts. The main reason for closing was serious losses. .

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 13, Guangdong. Zhanjiang Jingxin Power Plant owed workers wages, and the workers were forced to sit on the roof and wanted to jump off the building to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 13, Yantai, Shandong. Sansheng Ruyue Mingzhu real estate project owed workers wages, and the workers went to the Yantai City Petition Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 12, a woman in Hebei also found that her 300,000 yuan time deposit in the Agricultural Bank of China had turned into a financial product when she was withdrawing money and could not withdraw it, and she was still losing money.

content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 12, the media reported that a counselor at Harbin University of Finance issued a notice in the group to induce and force students to donate blood. Party members, class cadres and party activists who did not donate blood would be disqualified from awards, awards, and party membership.
On December 13, a staff member of the Harbin University of Finance office responded to reporters that the office had received a complaint about the online information today and the relevant departments were verifying it.
